suncertify.fields.viewers
Interface FieldView<E extends Field>

Type Parameters:
E - the field type parsed by this parser
All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BooleanFieldView, CurrencyFieldView, DateFieldView, IntegerFieldView, StringFieldView
public interface FieldView<E extends Field>
extends java.io.Serializable

A view of a Field. Fields could be displayed differently based on Locale etc.
